p: We distinguished a category of papers using mathematical software such as MATLAB ®; [ 102] and Mathematica ®; [ 85]. Others used more explicit modeling platforms for IBMs such as NetLogo [ 23, 90], RepastS [ 24] and AnyLogic ®; [ 94]. One model was implemented in Arena, which is specific software for discrete-event simulations [ 104]. Four studies reported a model implemented in C++ [ 80, 93, 97, 100].
